original: @21b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @21b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa nu yo ga ta tva bh'a ba no pa de sha n'a ma /
analyzed: aa nu yo ga ta tva bh'a ba no pa de sha n'a ma /
translated: Anuyogatattvabhāvanānopadesha-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: de nyid bde ba bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba /
analyzed: de nyid bde ba bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba /
translated: The Instruction on the Meditation of the Yoga Following the Meditation of the Reality Bliss

original: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the perfect yoginī.

original: gang zhig snying gar kha sbyor padma'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: gang zhig snying gar kha sbyor padma'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the lotus of union at the heart,

original: sems nyid phra zhing rab gsal khyab la nyams dang ldan //
analyzed: sems nyid phra zhing rab gsal khyab la nyams dang ldan //
translated: The subtle, clear, pervasive, and blissful mind itself,

original: khams gsum thams cad nye bar gnyis med thob 'gyur ba //
analyzed: khams gsum thams cad nye bar gnyis med thob 'gyur ba //
translated: Attains the non-dual near attainment of the entire three realms.

original: mnyam zhing gnyis med chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mnyam zhing gnyis med chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the space of phenomena, the equality of non-duality.

original: g-yo 'gyur dbang po'i rta rgod nang du thim pa de //
analyzed: g-yo 'gyur dbang po'i rta rgod nang du thim pa de //
translated: The wild horse of the moving sense faculties dissolves within,

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes yang dag snod du ni ;
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes yang dag snod du ni ;
translated: And becomes the perfect vessel for the wisdom of the victors.

original: / mkhas pas gnyis med thob 'gyur myur ma'i don rtogs pas //
analyzed: / mkhas pas gnyis med thob 'gyur myur ma'i don rtogs pas //
translated: The wise one attains non-duality and realizes the meaning of swiftness.

original: dpal ldan dri med nam mkha' ltar ni lta ba grub //
analyzed: dpal ldan dri med nam mkha' ltar ni lta ba grub //
translated: The glorious stainless view is like the sky.

original: sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni //
translated: The yoga of mindfulness of the Buddha is in the dharmadhātu.

original: chos dang chos nyid bsgoms pas chos sku'i rang bzhin thob //
analyzed: chos dang chos nyid bsgoms pas chos sku'i rang bzhin thob //
translated: By meditating on the Dharma and dharmatā, one obtains the nature of the dharmakāya.

original: de nyid dran tshor rig pa med 'gyur @22a * //
analyzed: de nyid dran tshor rig pa med 'gyur @22a * //
translated: That is not remembered, felt, or cognized;

original: yi shes mthong //
analyzed: yi shes mthong //
translated: it is seen with gnosis.

original: shin tu bsgoms pa'i dgos pa 'od gsal yid gnyis med //
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pa'i dgos pa 'od gsal yid gnyis med //
translated: The purpose of meditation is clear, nondual mind.

original: yi ge med pa'i theg le snying gar gnas pa ni //
analyzed: yi ge med pa'i theg le snying gar gnas pa ni //
translated: The bindu of the Anuttarātantra abides in the heart.

original: sgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu skye //
analyzed: sgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu skye //
translated: The yoga of meditation is the arising of gnosis.

original: de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro snying rjer ldan pa thams cad gnas //
analyzed: de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro snying rjer ldan pa thams cad gnas //
translated: From that, all vajra dakini are endowed with compassion.

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' khams su bcas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' khams su bcas //
translated: The buddhas and bodhisattvas are included in the elements.

original: de nyid rang bzhin mchod pas mchod 'os rnams las mchod pa thob //
analyzed: de nyid rang bzhin mchod pas mchod 'os rnams las mchod pa thob //
translated: That is the natural offering, the offering to those worthy of offering.

original: gang zhig rnal 'byor sgom byed sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod //
analyzed: gang zhig rnal 'byor sgom byed sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod //
translated: Those who meditate on the yoga are offered to the buddhas.

original: mchod sgom byed pa de ni 'bras bu sangs rgyas gsung //
analyzed: mchod sgom byed pa de ni 'bras bu sangs rgyas gsung //
translated: The meditation on the offering is the result, the Buddha said.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor nang gi bdag nyid gnyis sbyor bas //
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor nang gi bdag nyid gnyis sbyor bas //
translated: The inner nature of the vajra yoga is the union of the two.

original: de phyir rdo rje'i mchod pas mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod //
analyzed: de phyir rdo rje'i mchod pas mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod //
translated: Therefore, the wise should worship with the vajra offering.

original: ye shes lnga 'phros sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med //
analyzed: ye shes lnga 'phros sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med //
translated: The five wisdoms will spread and buddhahood will be attained, there is no doubt.

original: gang zhig rnal 'byor lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
analyzed: gang zhig rnal 'byor lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
translated: One who meditates on the navel, the emanation cakra,

original: bandu ka yi 'bras ltar bad drug ge sar dbus //
analyzed: bandu ka yi 'bras ltar bad drug ge sar dbus //
translated: in the center of the six petals like a bandha fruit,

original: aa ni su tri pre du ka rigs drug 'gag phyir bsgom //
analyzed: aa ni su tri pre du ka rigs drug 'gag phyir bsgom //
translated: the six families of a, su, tri, pre, du, and ku,

original: dbus su khong stong yig 'bru drug po rim gyis ni //
analyzed: dbus su khong stong yig 'bru drug po rim gyis ni //
translated: in the center, the six syllables are gradually absorbed

original: ka la thim pas sems nyid 'gags te skye ba med //
analyzed: ka la thim pas sems nyid 'gags te skye ba med //
translated: into ka, and the mind is arrested and is unborn.

original: bsgrib bya sgrib byed rang sems dri med dmigs pa med //
analyzed: bsgrib bya sgrib byed rang sems dri med dmigs pa med //
translated: The obscurations and the obscurer are the stainless mind, without reference point.

original: rgyud rnams 'dul phyir gsungs te rnal 'byor don dam min //
analyzed: rgyud rnams 'dul phyir gsungs te rnal 'byor don dam min //
translated: The tantras are taught for the sake of taming beings, but they are not the ultimate yoga.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub 'gyur rang bzhin mchod pa che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub 'gyur rang bzhin mchod pa che //
translated: All buddhas are attained; the great offering is the nature.

original: gnas chen nyi shu rang gnas sa lam rim pa thob //
analyzed: gnas chen nyi shu rang gnas sa lam rim pa thob //
translated: The twenty great sacred places are attained in one’s own place and on the stages of the path.

original: de phyir de nyid gzhan du mi tshol rang la gnas //
analyzed: de phyir de nyid gzhan du mi tshol rang la gnas //
translated: Therefore, do not seek reality elsewhere; it is present in oneself.

original: rnal 'byor de nyid ma rtogs 'khyams na ci zhig bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de nyid ma rtogs 'khyams na ci zhig bya //
translated: If one wanders without realizing that reality, what can be done?

original: gal te de nyid rtogs na gzhan du ci zhig bya //
analyzed: gal te de nyid rtogs na gzhan du ci zhig bya //
translated: If one realizes thatness, what else is there to do?

original: skal bzang bdag nyid rang la grub cing de nyid thob //
analyzed: skal bzang bdag nyid rang la grub cing de nyid thob //
translated: The fortunate one is accomplished in himself and attains thatness.

original: gang zhig gang gi sbyor bas brtul zhugs can gyis ni //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi sbyor bas brtul zhugs can gyis ni //
translated: By whose application the yogi

original: gnyis med bsam gtan la ni smon pa bzhin du spyod //
analyzed: gnyis med bsam gtan la ni smon pa bzhin du spyod //
translated: practices as wished in nondual meditation.

original: nam mkha'i gos can yang na rnal 'byor de min pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gos can yang na rnal 'byor de min pa //
translated: Or, the sky-clad one is not that yogi,

original: lus la yi dam lha gnas rang bzhin de nyid bsgom //
analyzed: lus la yi dam lha gnas rang bzhin de nyid bsgom //
translated: but meditates on the deity of the pledged deity residing in the body.

original: zla ba drug tu ngag bsdams mkha' 'gro rnams dang phrad //
analyzed: zla ba drug tu ngag bsdams mkha' 'gro rnams dang phrad //
translated: For six months, the speech is restrained, and one meets with the dakinis.

original: ye shes 'od 'phros rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam //
analyzed: ye shes 'od 'phros rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam //
translated: Wisdom light radiates, and the yogi is equal to the buddhas.

original: sgyu ma mkhan ltar 'dul mchog 'gro ba'i don mdzad do //
analyzed: sgyu ma mkhan ltar 'dul mchog 'gro ba'i don mdzad do //
translated: Like an illusionist, the supreme guide acts for the welfare of beings.

original: de nyid bde bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: de nyid bde bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The instruction for meditating on the yoga that follows the meditation on thatness, composed by Ācārya Kukkurīpāda, is complete.
